section:
&reftitle.runtime;
qr runtime configuration
directive default value descrpition
default_version -1 version number: -1 (auto) or 1-40
default_mode QR_EM_AUTO encoding mode: auto, numeric, alnum, 8bit or kanji (case insensitive)
default_eclevel QR_ECL_M error correction level: L, M, Q or H (case insensitive)
default_masktype -1 mask pattern type: -1 (auto) or 1-8
default_format QR_FMT_DIGIT output format: DIGIT, ASCII, JSON, PBM, BMP, SVG, TIFF, GIF, JPEG, PNG or WBMP (case insensitive)
default_magnify 1 pixel magnifying ratio: positive number
default_separator 4 separator width: 0 or positive number
default_maxnum 1 maximum number of symbols: 1-16
default_order 0 ordering method of symbols, in case the value, $n is ... = 0 (default): order to square as possible >= 1: order each $n symbols to horizontal <= -1: order each $n symbols to vertical
